name: PlatyPLUS
description:
When dinosaurs went extinct, a race of aquactic mammals came from outer space to re-populate Earth. The Platypus is a mighty creature that not only can lay eggs and is also a mammal, but can shoot powerful laser from their eyes. 

Combining their abilities they had to fight the Dodos, another alien species that came to conquer Earth! 

To defeat them, they could collect earth DNA to morph into two animals: beaver and duck, which helped them to adapt to their surroundings by flying and building bridges to get to the Leader Dodo, which will result in an intense showdown between the two alien species over who gets to repopulate planet Earth.

developed by Joint Force
